description: Reach for these gravel shoes when you need peddling efficiency in rough terrain. Built-in toe armour and low-profile, yet grippy, lugs perform when out of the saddle and a super stiff carbon sole provides power when peddling.Synthetic leather and mesh upper for durable, ventilated comfort.BOA® IP1 dial for quick and precise adjustments.Heel stabilizer locks in the fit.Silvadur® silver ion technology resists odours.Carbon composite sole is light and stiff.Abrasion-resistant TPU lugs balance performance with off-bike traction.
name: Shimano RX8 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
